mapper.select: select c.name as competitionName, ci.name as competitionItem, c.type as competitionType, c.start_time as startTime, c.sign_up_deadline as signUpDeadline, c.end_time as endTime, t.team_name as teamName, csut.status as signUpStatus, csut.reject_reason as rejectReason, csut.id as id from competition_sign_up_team csut left join competition c on c.id = csut.competition_id left join team_member_relation tmr on csut.team_id = tmr.team_id left join team t on t.id = csut.team_id left join competition_item_relation cir on cir.competition_id = c.id left join competition_item ci on ci.id = cir.competition_item_id where tmr.status = 1 and tmr.user_id = #{userId}
